dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer61 - Sony Home Video
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Sony Home Video ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Sony Home Video ] / :
 

Datavision                                RDR-GX315
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.datavis.com/images/VV/027242677470L.gif&size=2&dhm=f6bf309f&hl=en
 
Music Factory                          RDR-GX315
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.musicfactory.com/graphics/lgRDRGX315.jpg&size=2&dhm=fc7d8f72&hl=en
 
New World Video Direct         RDR-HX715
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.newworldvideodirect.com/images/products/1714_B.gif&size=2&dhm=77b0b908&hl=en
 
Online Home                            RDR-VX515
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://s108680890.onlinehome.us/JPG/846218.jpg&size=2&dhm=232db8b0&hl=en
 
Preferred Photo                        RDR-VX515
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.preferredphoto.com/images/big/snrdrvx515.jpg&size=2&dhm=20f5679d&hl=en
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [Phillip Williamson]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601]
Email (ended auction inquiries)*: [Ebay.Violations@NetEnforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 9/28/06]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Phillip Williamson
